title: Straight Time Hours Worked Per Month, Per Employee, All Employees on Hourly Basis, Class I Railroads for United States
notes:
Data Include Switching And Terminal Companies Until 1933 Source: Computed By NBER From Series (Total Straight Time Hours Worked Per Month, All Employees On Hourly Basis) And Series (Total Number Of Employees On Hourly Basis).

This NBER data series m08155 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 8 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter08.html.

NBER Indicator: m08155
